text: Tularosa is a villageFor census purposes it is called a village, but in New Mexico it is historically called a town. See, for example, Otero, Miguel A. (1903) Report of the Governor of New Mexico to the Secretary of the Interior - 1903 Government Printing Office, Washington, D.C., page 293 in Otero County, New Mexico, United States. The population was 2,553 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Villages in New Mexico
title: Tularosa, New Mexico
